text:
Sigmund Steinnes (19 January 1959 – 15 November 2018) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. He was born in Nordnes, Norway. In the 2013 elections, he was elected as a deputy representative to the Parliament of Norway from Troms. In the 2011 elections he was elected as the mayor of Storfjord.
Steinnes died of pancreatic cancer on 15 November 2018 in Oslo, aged 59.
